                                                         throws GOALParseException,
                                                                GOALCommandCancelledException,
                                                                GOALLaunchFailureException
        Launches a MAS program. Can only be killed if there is no runtime running right now #2666
        Parameters:
        masProgram - The registry that specifies how the MAS is to be launched.
        Returns:
        DOC
        Throws:
        GOALParseException
        GOALCommandCancelledException
        GOALLaunchFailureException

      • getRuntimeManager

        public RuntimeManager<IDEDebugger,IDEGOALInterpreter> getRuntimeManager()
        Returns the runtime service manager.
        Returns:
        The runtime service manager, or null if not available.

      • isRuntimeEnvironmentAvailable

        public boolean isRuntimeEnvironmentAvailable()
        Returns whether runtime services are available and a runtime environment has been created.
        Returns:
        true if runtime services are available via RuntimeManager; false otherwise.

      • shutDownRuntime

        public void shutDownRuntime()
                     throws GOALLaunchFailureException
        DOC Removes all observers, and kills environment, scheduler, MAS and agents in MAS.
        Throws:
        GOALLaunchFailureException
